name: Ovlo
long_description:
Ovlo is an AI shopping assistant that revolutionizes e-commerce discovery and conversion. Up to 68% of online shoppers abandon sites due to poor search experiences, leading to an estimated $2 trillion in lost sales annually.

Ovlo addresses this by offering natural, conversational search capabilities, bridging the gap between in-store personal assistance and online shopping. Unlike traditional search functions that often fail with simple queries, Ovlo understands and processes nuanced user requests, ensuring they find exactly what they need.

Our solution integrates seamlessly within minutes, eliminating the need for complex setups or extensive developer resources. Founded by a team of experts from Meta, Google, and Amazon, Ovlo delivers enterprise-grade technology to merchants without the typical six-figure implementation costs.
